godfather.name: Jupiter
godfather.description:
[Night action] order the Mafioso to attack a player. If you are unavailable, the Mafioso will attack their own target. If the Mafioso is unavailable, you will attack the target yourself.

[Passive] detection immunity, basic defense

Win condition: Mafia is at least half the population alive and all other threats to the Mafia are eliminated.

mafioso.name: Mars
mafioso.description:
[Night action] vote to attack a player. If the Godfather is unavailable, you will attack your own target.

Win condition: Mafia is at least half the population alive and all other threats to the Mafia are eliminated.

janitor.name: Io
janitor.description:
[Two-time night action] clean a player. If they are killed that night or lynched the next day, their role and last will will be hidden and you will be informed of it. If the player does not die during that timespan, the clean is not counted as used.

Win condition: Mafia is at least half the population alive and all other threats to the Mafia are eliminated.

toxicologist.name: Venus
toxicologist.description:
[Two-time night action] poison a player. Player poisoned is notified as such. If they are not cured that night or the next of the poison, they will be dealt an Unstoppable attack.

Win condition: Mafia is at least half the population alive and all other threats to the Mafia are eliminated.

consigliere.name: Ganymede
consigliere.description:
[Night action] investigate a player. You will get a report of their role name and alignment the next day.

Win condition: Mafia is at least half the population alive and all other threats to the Mafia are eliminated.

mailman.name: The Moon
mailman.description:
[Night action] send one player of your choice an anonymous message. They will receive it when the day starts.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

vagrant.name: Makemake
vagrant.description:
[Two-time night action] choose to equip a bulletproof vest, granting a one-shot Powerful defense that protects against one attack. Vest is also destroyed once an attack occurs with it equipped.

[Passive] seen as a member of the Mafia to Town investigative roles.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

one_shot_strongman.name: Mimas
one_shot_strongman.description:
[One-time night action] choose to attack a player. They are dealt an Unstoppable attack that cannot be blocked or otherwise.

Win condition: Mafia is at least half the population alive and all other threats to the Mafia are eliminated.

lover.name: Pluto
lover.description:
[Passive] share a chat with the other Lover, only open at night. If one Lover dies, the other will commit suicide over the loss.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

lover.name: Charon
lover.description:
[Passive] share a chat with the other Lover, only open at night. If one Lover dies, the other will commit suicide over the loss.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

sheriff.name: Umbriel
sheriff.description:
[Night action] interrogate a player. You will be presented with the alignment of the player the next day.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

investigator.name: Earth
investigator.description:
[Night action] investigate a player. You will be presented with the role name of the player the next day.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

doctor.name: Deimos
doctor.description:
[Night action] protect a player. This gives them a Powerful defense and cures the target of poison (if applicable). Can only protect self once.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

doctor.name: Phobos
doctor.description:
[Night action] protect a player. This gives them a Powerful defense and cures the target of poison (if applicable). Can only protect self once.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

one_shot_vigilante.name: Neptune
one_shot_vigilante.description:
[One-time night action] shoot a player. They are dealt a Powerful attack.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

escort.name: Callisto
escort.description:
[Night action] roleblock a player. This prevents them from using their night action (if applicable).

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

tracker.name: Eris
tracker.description:
[Night action] track a player. You will be notified of who they visited on that night when the day starts.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

lookout.name: Mercury
lookout.description:
[Night action] check a player. You will be notified of who visited your target on that night when the day starts.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

driver.name: Titan
driver.description:
[Two-time night action] redirect actions performed on one player to another.

[Passive] roleblock immunity

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

deputy.name: Ceres
deputy.description:
[Passive] become an Investigator or Sheriff should either of them die, taking the place of the one who died first (if applicable).

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

marshal.name: Sol
marshal.description:
[One-time night action] triple the number of lynches for the next day on any night.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

influencer.name: Saturn
influencer.description:
[Night action] choose to block the vote of a player or double it the next day. Cannot target the same player consecutively.

Win condition: eliminate all threats to the Town.

revolutionary.name: Uranus
revolutionary.description:
[Night action] choose to tag a player every night. You will be notified of a noun the next day. If the tagged player says the noun in any of the public chats during the day, they will blow up and die immediately.

[Passive] basic defense

Win condition: kill three people using this method to become the immediate sole winner.

survivor.name: Planet Nine
survivor.description: Win condition: survive to the end of the game.

jester.name: Sedna
jester.description:
[Special] haunt a player at night who voted you in the trial when you get lynched. They will be dealt an Unstoppable attack.

Win condition: get youself lynched at all costs.

jack_of_all_trades.name: 'Oumuamua
jack_of_all_trades.description:
[Night action] roll a random night action every night. Each action will have its own condition. You may not self-target with any action.

[Passive] basic defense

Win condition: fulfil the conditions of four night actions.
